attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it highly inappropriate that I pay my licence fee each year, but am forced to listen to a wholly unprofessional DJ such as Ms Bowman every day. I understand the need for diversity on the BBC, but paying to listen to a woman who talks about nothing for 3 hours every day is not something we should willingly accept

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
